entry.title: Hexo 相关配置
entry.content: 最重要的是，学会感受生命的快乐生活已经耗尽了他们全部的光和热，以至于没有更多的生命力去温暖他人，我无法说他们是可悲的或是其他什么， default primary success info warning danger android开发吧java吧c++吧c语言神奇海螺有问题为什么不先问问隔壁Java吧呢？有问题为什么不先问问隔壁C++吧呢？有问题为什么不先问问隔壁C语言吧呢？有问题为什么不先问问神奇海螺吧呢？有问必答不知道 站点配置文件 主题配置文件 站点配置文件 主题配置文件 Do not just seek happiness for yourself. Seek happiness for all. Through kindness. Through mercy. David LevithanWide Awake |载入天数…载入时分秒… var now = new Date(); function createtime() { var grt= new Date("01/24/2019 08:39:00"); //此处修改为建站时间或网站上线时间 now.setTime(now.getTime()+250); days = (now - grt ) / 1000 / 60 / 60 / 24; dnum = Math.floor(days); hours = (now - grt ) / 1000 / 60 / 60 - (24 * dnum); hnum = Math.floor(hours); if(String(hnum).length ==1 ){hnum = "0" + hnum;} minutes = (now - grt ) / 1000 /60 - (24 * 60 * dnum) - (60 * hnum); mnum = Math.floor(minutes); if(String(mnum).length ==1 ){mnum = "0" + mnum;} seconds = (now - grt ) / 1000 - (24 * 60 * 60 * dnum) - (60 * 60 * hnum) - (60 * mnum); snum = Math.round(seconds); if(String(snum).length ==1 ){snum = "0" + snum;} document.getElementById("timeDate").innerHTML = "已存活 "+dnum+" 天 "; document.getElementById("times").innerHTML = hnum + " 时 " + mnum + " 分 " + snum + " 秒"; } setInterval("createtime()",250); //其中的width=298 height=52 均改为0就看不到了，依然可以播放音乐 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nude_Descending_a_Staircase,_No._2#/media/File:Duchamp_-_Nude_Descending_a_Staircase.jpg 铅笔 上传 下载
